title: readit
description: A schema describing the data model used by the readit program to specify files and options to be read and combined.

renameAll.description: Either a string or dict containing mappings to rename variables across all files.  This will be implemented after all files are appended, but may be implemented while consuming files at a later date.

globalFileType.description: A string that will define the file types for all files.  This should only be used if all of the data have the same format.

globalOptions.description: Either a string or dict containing options that will be passed to all calls to the Pandas read methods.

files.description: Objects that provide the path and file specific options to the program.

filenm.description: The path to the file that will be consumed.

ext.description: The file extension.  This can be used for filetype inference if needed.

filetype.description: A string indicating what type of data set is referenced by this file.

options.description: Options that should be passed to the Pandas reader for this file.
